FoW - Definition.name: Anatomy & Body Proportions
FoW - Definition.notes: Tokens to correct anatomical inaccuracies and body proportion issues.

FoW - Definition.name: Body Shape & Form
FoW - Definition.notes: Tokens to address issues with body shape, form, and distortions.

tokens.tooltip: Fixes any general distortion of the body shape.
Corrects any warping or unusual shaping of body parts.

FoW - Definition.name: Rendering & Style Issues
FoW - Definition.notes: Tokens to correct rendering artifacts and stylistic inconsistencies.

tokens.tooltip: Adds a more skin alike look to the generated result.

FoW - Definition.name: Feature Definition
FoW - Definition.notes: Tokens to control the definition and separation of features.

FoW - Definition.name: Drawing Quality
FoW - Definition.notes: Tokens to improve the overall drawing quality and address common drawing errors.

tokens.tooltip: Redraw most part with more care
Add detail to make a final version
